text: Paul is a 2011 British-American science fiction comedy movie. It was produced by Nira Park, Tim Bevan and Eric Fellner. It was directed by Greg Mottola. The movie was released on February 14, 2011 in the United Kingdom and was released in the United States on March 18, 2011. It is set in Nevada and was filmed in New Mexico. The movie received positive reviews with a 66% on Rotten Tomatoes which is fresh. == Cast == *Simon Pegg as Graeme Willy *Nick Frost as Clive Gollings *Seth Rogen as the voice of Paul *Jason Bateman as Special Agent Lorenzo Zoil *Kristen Wiig as Ruth *Bill Hader as Agent Haggard *Gregg Turkington as Neil Hamburger *Jane Lynch as Pat Stevenson *Sigourney Weaver as "The Big Guy" *Blythe Danner as Tara Walton *Mia Stallard as Young Tara *Joe Lo Truglio as O'Reilly *John Carroll Lynch as Moses Buggs *David Koechner as Gus *Jesse Plemons as Jake *Jeffrey Tambor as Adam Shadowchild *Luke Jackson as Ford *Paula LaBaredas as Princess Leia *Chris Bentley as Highway Patrolman (uncredited) *Justin Reed as Comic Con Guest == Other websites == *Paul's official website * * Category:2011 buddy movies Category:2011 comedy movies Category:2011 science fiction movies Category:American buddy comedy movies Category:American road movies Category:American science fiction movies Category:British buddy movies Category:British comedy movies Category:British science fiction movies Category:2010s buddy comedy movies Category:Comedy science fiction movies Category:Movies set in Nevada
title: Paul (movie)
